#IOTA Crypto Core FPGA moved from Cortex @Arm to @risc_v. RISC-V is much more open-source friendly (CPU-core MIT licensed),  faster compared to Cortex M1 (e.g. hardware divider, I- and D-cache) and very flexible (extendable with plugins, custom instructions, ...)  🚀
